Appearance_Desc_Key: Select an appearance variant for the control.
AutoControlHeight_Desc_Key: Allow the control to determine the height
AutoControlWidth_Desc_Key: Allow the control to determine the width
ChoiceGroupField_Desc_Key: A ChoiceGroup combines a text field and a dropdown giving people a way to select an option from a list or enter their own choice.
Content_Height_Desc_Key: Actual height required by the field.
Content_Width_Desc_Key: Actual width required by the field.
ControlHeight_Desc_Key: Height of the user interactive control
ControlWidth_Desc_Key: Width of the user interactive control
Events_Desc_Key: List of events that executed since the last component output refresh.
Hint_Desc_Key: Hint Text to display below the field.
Info_Desc_Key: If set, an info button will appear that will reveal the info content when clicked.
Items_Desc_Key: Available options to choose.  Include a Key column and Text column to display.
LabelAlign_Desc_Key: Determines the alignment of the label.
LabelFont_Desc_Key: Override the default theme font for the field label.
LabelFontColor_Desc_Key: Override the default theme font color for the field label.
LabelFontSize_Desc_Key: Override the default theme font size for the field label.
LabelFontWeight_Desc_Key: Override the default theme font weight for the field label.
LabelWidth_Desc_Key: Overrides the default width of the label.
LabelWrap_Desc_Key: Determines whether the label will wrap if the label exceeds the available space.
Layout_Desc_Key: Choose a layout variant for the control.
Multiselect_Desc_Key: Allow for single selection or multiple selection.
OnResize_Desc_Key: Executes when the internal content area of the control changes.
OnValueChange_Desc_Key: Executes when the value of the control changes.
Orientation_Desc_Key: Select whether the label should be oriented vertically or horizontally.
Required_Desc_Key: Shows an asterisk if the field is required.
Size_Desc_Key: Choose the size for the label and control if supported.
Validate_Desc_Key: Determines when validation should be processed and output to the Validation output.
Validation_Desc_Key: Resultant validation state.  Displays the Validation Message and Validation State based on the Validate configuration.
ValidationMessage_Desc_Key: Validation message to display.  Message style can be changed by using the Validation State.
ValidationSchema_Desc_Key: JSON Schema for the Validaton Output Object
ValidationState_Desc_Key: Changes the appearance of the Validation Message
